channel.title: Rune-evo make an npc give you dung xp,auto drops
channel.description: hey guys, im making a dung minigame in wich you kill npcs for tickets (how do i add autodrops again? like if i kill a skeleton i get bones right in my inv?)anyway i have to make these npcs give you dungeoneering xp when you kill them, how exactly is this done? :) thankx

item.title: Rune-evo make an npc give you dung xp,auto drops
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

This is adding the xp, i read your last reply and it somewhat helped me out but now i cant find the line fror that npc so when i kill it it gives me dung xp
